title: Teenager and man stabbed in separate incidents in north London
text:
A teenage boy and a man have been stabbed in separate incidents in Haringey, the Metropolitan Police said.

Officers were called to Sycamore Gardens, Tottenham, at 10.18pm to reports of a stabbing.

They attended and found a teenage boy with stab injuries.

He was treated at the scene and taken by London Ambulance Service to hospital. His condition is not known.

Soon afterwards, at 10.41pm, officers were called to Herbert Road, Tottenham, where they found a man in his 20s with stab injuries.

Paramedics treated him at the scene and took him to hospital. His condition was not immediately known.

Crime scenes were put in place on Sycamore Gardens and Herbert Road.

MPS Haringey have put a section 60 order in place until 1pm on Monday.

The order covers the N8 Turnpike Lane area, N15, N17 and N22.

The directive allows police expanded stop and search powers.
description: A teenage boy and a man have been stabbed in separate incidents in Haringey, the Metropolitan Police said.
